remarks: Equivalent expressions for "not less than".  ( ~ chnlei analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lssnle.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lssnle.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lssnle.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lssnle $p |- ( ph -> ( -. U C_ T <-> T C. ( T .(+) U ) ) ) $.
